main event: A 15-year-old student observed a satellite-like object over Chicago, Illinois, on August 1, 1965, for approximately 2-3 minutes.
interesting points: The observed object was white with a bluish tint and thought to be Satellite ECHO 14,Two additional students confirmed the sighting but did not provide their names,The object was reportedly seen descending from 60 degrees to the horizon,The conclusion of the report identified the object as likely a satellite,No physical evidence or photographs were taken.
